name: Ch.9ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Joshua;Hmmm...|I think I could get used to being by the sea.|It's a lot better than being stuck in the sand all the time...
speak;Joshua;I have a feeling trouble is approaching...
speak;Larachel;Excuse me, good sir!|I'm looking for a man who must be lost!|He has brown hair, likes to sneak around, and is mildly handsome.|Have you seen him around?
speak;Joshua;I'm sorry there, lady.|Can't say that I have.
speak;Larachel;Ooooh, that Rennac!|Where in the world could he have gone off to?|*Sigh* Well, thank you, sir.|If you see him around, please let me know...
speak;Larachel;Thank you!|Dozla!|Let us search somewhere else!
speak;Joshua;Why do I get the feeling that she was royalty?...|Happy she left, though. That was a close one...|The last thing I need is more princesses and princes sniffing around me...
